title: Biblioteca dell'Archivum Romanicum, Serie II: Linguistica
additional-notes: This is an Italian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding a volume is in the public domain, search for book renewals for the volume under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual volume titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
